scripts.ssl: mkdir -p ssl && openssl req -x509 -nodes -days 365 -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout ssl/server.key -out ssl/server.crt -subj '/C=US/ST=State/L=City/O=AssetManagement/CN=asset-manager.local'
scripts.hash-password: node -e "const bcrypt = require('bcryptjs'); const pw = process.argv[1]; bcrypt.hash(pw, 10).then(hash => console.log('ADMIN_PASSWORD_HASH=' + hash));"
